item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Charlotte Perkins Gilman
item.description: "I'm sure I never used to be so sensitive. I think it is due to this nervous condition." -- Charlotte Perkins Gilman

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." -- Confucious

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Frances Hodgson Burnett
item.description: "If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden." -- Frances Hodgson Burnett

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Frances Hodgson Burnett
item.description: "When you will not fly into a passion people know you are stronger than they are, because you are strong enough to hold in your rage, and they are not, and they say stupid things they wish they hadn't said afterward. There's nothing so strong as rage, except what makes you hold it in--that's stronger. It's a good thing not to answer your enemies." -- Frances Hodgson Burnett

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I have a history of making decisions very quickly about men. I have always fallen in love fast and without measuring risks. I have a tendency not only to see the best in everyone, but to assume that everyone is emotionally capable of reaching his highest potential. I have fallen in love more times than I care to count with the highest potential of a man, rather than with the man himself, and I have hung on to the relationship for a long time (sometimes far too long) waiting for the man to ascend to his own greatness. Many times in romance I have been a victim of my own optimism." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "This must be Thursday,' said Arthur to himself, sinking low over his beer. 'I never could get the hang of Thursdays." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Candace Bushnell
item.description: "Man may have discovered fire, but women discovered how to play with it." -- Candace Bushnell

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional." -- haruki murakami

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Marilyn Manson
item.description: "When you're taught to love everyone, to love your enemies, then what value does that place on love?" -- Marilyn Manson

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Tina Fey
item.description: "Don’t waste your energy trying to educate or change opinions; go over, under, through, and opinions will change organically when you’re the boss. Or they won’t. Who cares? Do your thing, and don’t care if they like it." -- Tina Fey

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The more I know of the world, the more I am convinced that I shall never see a man whom I can really love. I require so much!" -- Jane Austen

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Tatiana add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein
